channel.title: Lrd on Wesley Hales
channel.description: Recent content in Lrd on Wesley Hales

item.title: Maven 2 vs. Ant (revisited)
item.description: Almost a year since I made this entry and I think Maven is great for open source and commercial apps. Sure, there may be a few things you want to do that don't fit into the "Maven way" but for the most part, it is a great build system. Also, any one that uses IntelliJ Idea will fall in love with Maven on first use (I guess it handles Eclipse project files just as well).
